title: Depravity
description: I was born an ordinary girl with a tiny seed of sickness.As I got older it grew bigger, manifesting into something sinister.Mama told me to lock it away and let it wither.I didnâ€™t know how.So I hid it.Solitude became my closest companion.Solo, single, lonely.Until Declan.Until Ethan.They were drawn to my sickness like moths to a flame.With them, I was nurtured into something special.With them, I flourished in depths of decay and darkness.(mm/mmf/ mfm.) Standalone. *Usually would insert warning here*
author: Natalie Bennett
